@dcexaminer @brithume @realDonaldTrump "He also blasted the coverage of the coronavirus pandemic, saying they are pushing a narrative that shutdowns need to continue."

Now we know where you stand, Brit. GOP talking points. Just another snake oil peddler. Just another #maga sap.
